dialogue.introduction: Nice to meet you. I'm Ayanami, a special class destroyer.
dialogue.library_intro: Special class destroyer, Ayanami. I'm the first ship of the improved Fubuki class. In the Third Battle of the Solomon Sea, I showed an outstanding performance as a destroyer. I'll do my best!
dialogue.secretary3: If you keep talking so much, you won't be able to do your job properly...
dialogue.secretaryidle: Commander, thanks for always working so hard. Ayanami will support you all the way.
dialogue.secretarymarried: Commander, Ayanami is also working hard by myself. But, if I'm with you... I'll work even harder!
dialogue.wedding: Am I Ayanami doing my best? Do I help you well? ...R-really! I'm so glad to hear it!
dialogue.equipment1: Haa~ I'm healed, thanks for that~
dialogue.equipment2: Ayanami, It feels like I'm reborn!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Please let me rest for a bit...
dialogue.docking_complete: The girl that was repairing came back!
dialogue.ship_construction: It seems like a new friend is coming!
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet is back from completing the operation.
dialogue.battle_start: Beginning surface action to port side!
dialogue.night_battle: I won't give up these waters!
dialogue.mvp: Ayanami being the best makes me happy! It's thanks to the Commander.
dialogue.sunk: I wonder if Fubuki is safe... really, thank goodness.
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: I did it! Commander, congratulation on this 2 years anniversary. Ehehe
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: The Rainy Season... if you change the way you feel about it, the sound of the rain sounds very soothing. Don't you think so, Commander?
dialogue.midsummer_2015: Summer sure is hot. Commander, should I open up the watermelon that Shikinami brought?
dialogue.fall_2015: I (Ayanami) love this season. Also it was fall when ayanami was launched for the first time. Ufufuâ™ª
dialogue.christmas_2015: Merry Christmas, Commander! Here, it's a present from Ayanami and Shikinami! Have some cake as well!
dialogue.new_year_2016: Commander, Happy New Year! This year as well, please take of Ayanami and the others!

hourly.0000: 000 hours. Sorry to disturb you so late at night.
hourly.0100: 0100 hours. Please turn it down if it's disturbing you.
hourly.0200: And it's 0200 hoooours! We should probably whisper a little more seeing as it's so late.
hourly.0400: It's 0400 hours...Ayanami can...manage this...it'll be morning...soon...
hourly.0500: It's 0500 hours. Almost time for reveille. The Fleet Girls will be getting up soon.
hourly.0600: It's 0600 hours. Morning's here. Good morning, Commander. Let's give it our all today.
hourly.0700: It's 0700 hours. Commander, I've left a towel out for you.
hourly.0800: It's 0800 hours. Commander, I have your breakfast ready. Would you like Miso soup too?
hourly.0900: It's 0900 hours. Should we make a start on the daily missions? Understood sir.
hourly.1000: It's 1000 hours. Do you need require anything of Ayanami?
hourly.1100: It's 1100 hours. It's about time to start making lunch preparations. Understood. Please leave it me.
hourly.1200: Midday. I have your lunch ready. Today is Ayanami's Special Nikujaga Meal Set! How does it taste?
hourly.1300: It's 1300 hours. Well Ayanami thinks that worked out well if she does think so. Did you enjoy it, Commander?
hourly.1400: It's 1400 hours. Right! It's time for Ayanami to show you what she can really do. She's going to give it her all.
hourly.1500: It's 1500 hours. Ayanami is going to do her best to help increase our fleet's ranking.
hourly.1600: 1600 hours. Despite everything, Ayanami didn't let the enemy escape. I'll begin work on the mission reports.
hourly.1700: It's 1700 hours. Should Ayanami keep at it a little longer?
hourly.1800: It's 1800 hours. Almost night time. Ayanami is feeling a little tired.
hourly.1900: It's 1900 hours. Ayanami can use the office bath!? Is i-Is it really ok!?
hourly.2000: It's 2000 hours. Ayanami really appreciates the offer, but the bath at the dock are empty and those are more than enough.
hourly.2100: It's 2100 hours. Naval Base is really peaceful at night isn't it?
hourly.2200: It is now 2200 hours. Let's give the night shift our best too.
hourly.2300: It's 2300 hours. Commander, you know what? Ayanami now feels more confident about night battles. She'll be fine this time for sure!
